short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PoConvert - Fast & Easy image conversion tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple and quick conversions new tab tool to convert your images to your desired format.
You can easily just drag and drop your image to this awesome new-tab, choose your desired format and convert it easily.
Your image is processed locally and never sent to our servers. We will never store your images.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing PoConvert extension and setting Chrome New-Tab to that provider by the service and the Terms of Use (https://poconvert.com/end-user-license-agreement/) and Policy (https://poconvert.com/privacy-policy/). This extension changes your search engine on the New Tab to Microsoft Bing.
